Model.Country

    程序包 说明
    Model  

    • Model中Country的使用

      声明为Country的Model中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      Country[] Risk_Model.countries
      The countries.
      Country CountryLabel.country
      The country.
      Country Card.country
      The country.
      Country Risk_Model.countryA
      The country A.
      Country Risk_Model.countryB
      The country B.
      类型参数类型为Country的Model中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> Country.adjacencies
      The adjacencies.
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> Board.adjacenciesList
      The adjacencies list.
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> Continent.countries
      The countries.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Country> Player.countriesHeld
      The countries held.
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> Board.countriesList
      The countries list.

      The countries map.

      The country.

      返回Country的Model中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Country Card.getCountry()
      Gets the country.
      Country Board.getCountryByName(java.lang.String countryName)
      Returns the country object for the country specified by the string countryName.
      返回变量类型为Country的类型的Model中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> Country.getAdjacencies()
      Returns a list of the country objects that are adjacent to this country on the board.
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> Board.getAdjacencies(java.lang.String countryName)
      Returns a list of the country objects that are the countries adjacent to the country specified by the string countryName on the board.
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> Board.getCountries()
      Returns a list of all of the country objects in the board.
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> Continent.getMemberCountries()
      Returns a list of the country objects that are on this continent.
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> Board.getMemberCountries(java.lang.String continentName)
      Returns a list of the country objects that are in the continent specified by the string continentName.
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> Player.getOwnedCountries()
      Gets the owned countries.
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> Board.getUnoccupied()
      Gets the unoccupied.
      参数类型为Country的Model中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Player.addCountry(Country country)
      When a player conquers a country the country needs to be added to a data structure that keeps track of all the countries the player occupies.
      类型变量类型为Country的Model中的方法参数 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Country.addAdjacencies(java.util.ArrayList<Country> adjacencies)
      Used only when constructing the country object, it should not be called after the board is initialized.
      void Player.addCountry(java.util.ArrayList<Country> countriesList)
      Works like addCountry above, but can be used to add multiple countries at once.
      参数类型为Country的Model中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Card(java.lang.String type, Country country)
      Instantiates a new card.
      CountryLabel(Risk_Model model, Country country)
      Instantiates a new country label.
      类型变量类型为Country的Model中的构造器参数 
      构造器和说明
      Continent(java.lang.String name, int bonusArmies, java.util.ArrayList<Country> memberCountries)
      Instantiates a new continent.
      Deck(java.util.ArrayList<Country> countries)
      Creates all cards, one for each territory.
